text: The ASUS Eee PC is a very small laptop made by ASUS and Intel. It is designed to have a light weight and low price. It runs Linux as its operating system. The name Eee (pronounced as the letter e, IPA /iÀê/) comes from "the three Es," ASUS used in their advertisements for the device: "Easy to learn, Easy to work, Easy to play". == References == == Other websites == * ASUS Eee PC website Category:Laptops
title: ASUS Eee PC
